main event: A UFO sighting was reported on April 28, 1963, in the Pacific Ocean, where an object assumed to be a satellite was visually followed to the horizon.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes,The object displayed blue and white colors while moving rapidly,The sighting coordinates were specifically recorded at 50.35N 170.10W,The object was classified as unidentified due to lack of further information,The sighting involved visual observation rather than electronic tracking.
sighted object: object assumed to be a satellite
